rooms.description: A welcoming space designed in accordance with Vastu principles with a north-eastern orientation for positivity.
Combines cooking and living spaces seamlessly, promoting interaction and open communication. Designed to have east-west alignment for optimum natural light while ensuring a balanced flow.
North-eastern oriented master bedroom with ample storage and an en-suite bathroom. Includes Vastu principles to enhance energy and prosperity.
A compact living and sleeping area designed for the domestic staff, ensuring privacy while maintaining efficient layout.
North-west oriented room to balance the energy flows in accordance with Vastu principles.
Provides access to the rooftop terrace and adds natural light; designed per local building norms for safety and stability.
An expansive open area with seating arrangements and greenery. Provides a communal outdoor space that aligns with Vastu principles of balance and harmony.
